name: gemini-cli-turkce
description: Türkçe lokalizasyonlu Gemini CLI - Turkish-localized Gemini CLI wrapper with enhanced features

scripts.copy-locales: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');const src='src/locales';const dest='dist/locales';if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(f=>fs.copyFileSync(path.join(src,f),path.join(dest,f)));console.log('Locales copied to dist/')"
scripts.test: echo "Tests will be added in Phase 5" && exit 0
